treatment-md.title: Argentinolycus Matallanas & Corbella, 2012, gen. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Redescription of Iluocoetes Jenyns, 1842; proposal of a new genus, Argentinolycus, for Iluocoetes elongatus (Smitt, 1898), and description of Patagolycus melastomus gen. et sp. nov. (Teleostei, Zoarcidae)
